checkInbox().details: 'checkInbox checks 'ipfs_hash' and, if there is 0 > bytes emits and responce to the account checking.

getHash(string).details: returns the IPFS file hash when state variable 'getHash is called'.

params.x: is the verified IPFS file hash.

sendIPFS(address,string).details: sendIPFS sends the file hash to '_address'.

params._ipfsHash: is the value called from the contact state.

setHash(string).details: stores the IPFS file hash in the state variable 'setHash'.

checkInbox().notice: This function checks the value of 'ipfs_hash' to see if it is storing bytes. If the value is storing 0 > bytes it emits a notificaitons.

methods.constructor: This empty constructor is used to initialize the contract.

getHash(string).notice: Return 'x' (the IPFS file hash) from the contract memory.

sendIPFS(address,string).notice: The IPFS file hash is sent to a recipeint account.

setHash(string).notice: Store 'x' (the IPFS file hash) in the contract state.
